title: Roast turkey breast with black pudding and thyme baked potatoes
description: Ensure your roast turkey breast isn't dry by adding a layer of rich black pudding. Served with tender potatoes and black pudding stuffing.Equipment and preparation: You will need six dariole moulds.
ingredients: 1 x 1.1kg/2lb 7oz turkey breast, bones removed, skin on
4 slices white bread, crusts removed, cut into 5mm/¼in cubes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
55g/2oz melted butter, plus extra for brushing
1.5kg/3lb 5oz floury potatoes, cut into 5cm/2in long cylinders
